name: Hide Youtube Comments - Oct 2012 Layout overhaul
description: Hides Youtube comments section on the New layout Updated to work with YouTube 09/04/2013 IMPORTANT: YOU CAN SHOW THEM BY MOUSING OVER THE REPLY BOX
additional_info:
Tired of the absolutely horrible YouTube community? Wish for a way to get rid of it all and just watch the amazing videos? well here's your solution!

This handy dandy style automatically hides the YouTube comments section from the new YouTube Layout released in October 2012.
I personally use this style all the time, and will update it whenever it breaks. If it doesn't work for your version, message me!

You can reveal them by mousing over the reply box

Features:
- Hides the youtube comments section
- Reveals the comments section when you mouse over the reply box
- Keeps the comments section revealed whilst the mouse is over the comments
- only 12 lines of code
